Start by gathering all the necessary information to keep up with the news. This could include subscribing to online news sources, following news channels on social media, and joining news-related groups or communities.

Create a daily routine that includes time for checking news updates. This could involve setting aside specific times during the day to check news websites or apps, or setting reminders to stay on top of breaking news.
Use technology to your advantage by investing in a smart speaker or smart home assistant device that can provide real-time news updates.
Get involved in your community by attending local news events or joining local news groups to stay informed about what's happening in your area.
Consider volunteering for a local news organization or becoming a citizen journalist to gain a deeper understanding of the news and stay on top of current events.
